title: Oath Keepers Leader Sought to Get Message to Trump After Jan. 6
description: One of the government’s final witnesses in the seditious conspiracy trial of members of the far-right group described attempts by Stewart Rhodes to urge Donald J. Trump to keep his grip on power.
dc:creator: Alan Feuer and Zach Montague

media:content.media:description: A man wearing an Oath Keepers shirt last year. The seditious conspiracy charges against the group’s founder and four associates are among the most severe to have been filed so far in connection with Jan. 6.
